JAXB Runtime Library

Final Draft specification, version 1.0, January, 2003
Comments to: jaxb-spec-comments@sun.com
More information at: http://java.sun.com/xml/jaxb
 
 

Final Draft


 
JAXB Packages
javax.xml  
javax.xml.bind Provides a runtime binding framework for client applications including unmarshalling, marshalling, and validation capabilities.
javax.xml.bind.helpers JAXB Provider Use Only: Provides partial default implementations for some of the javax.xml.bind interfaces.
javax.xml.bind.util Useful client utility classes.
javax.xml.namespace This package contains the QName and NamespaceContext classes.
